title: Solutions Architet & Developer (Salaried) - Client Solutions on Multiple Industries

responsibilities.responsibilty: Designed Azure, .Net, Angular Service-Orientated Architecture (SOA) solutions that met business and technical requirements for multiple clients.
Developed scalable, maintainable, performant services using technologies which interacted with APIs, Azure B2C, Azure Functions, Service Bus, DataFactory and Azure SQL (SQL Server) database.
Managed offshore teams by providing architectural direction, code reviews and technical guidance thereby ensuring quality
Developed code assets for hand off to offshore developers using C# in .Net Core, Angular 15 and Blazor for high quality, robust, and scalable web applications in the Azure cloud.
Executed client statements of work by supporting consulting and Cloud DevOps team.
Maintained excellent client relationships and added value to sales process from a technical standpoint.
Played a pivotal role in aligning technology solutions with client business goals, contributing to the overall success of the projects.
